title: Family favourite lasagne
ingredients: ['675g lean mince', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '300g tomato puree', '12 dried lasagne sheets', '2 eggs, beaten', '575g ricotta cheese', '50g grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '450g mozzarella cheese, grated', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
